p: The data of apparent total tract digestibility data are presented in Table 3. During growing and finishing period, pigs fed with RPO and NPD had higher ( p < 0.05) ATTD of dry matter than pigs fed with RPD and RPA. Additionally, pigs fed with RPO had the highest ( p < 0.01) ATTD of CP while pigs fed with RPA had the lowest ATTD of CP. The ATTD of CP was not different ( p > 0.05) between NPD and RPD treatments. Additionally, the ATTD of gross energy was not different among four treatments ( p > 0.05).
